author: Ainsley Harriott
method: To make the chocolate mousse, melt the chocolate in a glass bowl over simmering water. Whip the cream until soft peaks form. Mix the two together to form a marble effect.  Be careful not to overmix them. Put into a tall glass. For the oranges, in a medium saucepan heat the butter and the sugar together to form a caramel. Add the oranges and continue to cook for two minutes. Place in a small glass dish and serve with the chocolate mousse.
